abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32315809, pmid32313382, pmid32319081, pmid32312827, pmid32194944, pmid32313405, pmid32312831, pmid32319102, pmid32315171, pmid32315026, pmid32314804, pmid32317050, pmid32320004, pmid32316718, pmid32315390, pmid32320083, pmid32317220, pmid32315487, pmid32319118, pmid32320064, pmid32320059, pmid32318328, pmid32315907, pmid32315667, pmid32320062, pmid32317235, pmid32319129, pmid32313158, pmid32314861, pmid32317203, pmid32318706, pmid32314806, pmid32318865, pmid32313804, pmid32319792, pmid32317402, pmid32318324, pmid32320066, pmid32318327
